text: (Fir‘aon) wí pé: "Ṣé ẹ ti gbà á gbọ́ ṣíwájú kí n̄g tó yọ̀ǹda fun yín? Dájúdájú òun ni àgbà yín tí ó kọ yín ní idán pípa. Nítorí náà, dájúdájú mo máa gé àwọn ọwọ́ yín àti ẹsẹ̀ yín ní ìpasípayọ. Dájúdájú mo tún máa kàn yín mọ́ àwọn igi dàbínù. Dájúdájú ẹ̀yin yóò mọ èwo nínú wa ni ìyà (rẹ̀) yóò le jùlọ, tí ó sì máa pẹ́ jùlọ
